evidence.claim: White Glove Community Care operates under HIPAA compliance protocols.
The company references EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) capabilities on its career and service pages.
HL7 standards are mentioned in context with data sharing practices within the healthcare ecosystem.
The firm promotes interoperability via FHIR standards in their patient care solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No direct evidence of X12 transaction use cases or API automation found.
